name: winbox
description: Lightweight window manager for the web.
author: Thomas Wilkerling

scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir dist /s /q && mkdir dist
scripts.build:css: lessc --autoprefix=">=1%" --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --rebase" src/css/winbox.less dist/css/winbox.css && csso dist/css/winbox.css --output dist/css/winbox.css
scripts.build:css:bundle: cpx "src/css/winbox.less" tmp/ && lessc --autoprefix=">=1%" --clean-css="--s1 --advanced --rebase" tmp/winbox.less tmp/winbox.css && csso tmp/winbox.css --output tmp/winbox.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:svg && npm run build:css && node task/bundle --image && npm run build:css:bundle && node task/bundle --style && npm run build:js && npm run build:bundle && echo Build Complete. && exit 0
scripts.update: npm install base64-img@latest && npm install cpx@latest && npm install csso@latest && npm install csso-cli@latest && npm install google-closure-compiler@nightly && npm install less@latest && npm install less-plugin-autoprefix@latest && npm install less-plugin-clean-css@latest && npm install web-servo@latest
